abstract: China has reportedly inflicted severe punishment on 15 Communist Party officials in central Tibet who have been accused of aiding independence groups there.
lead_paragraph: The officials provided intelligence to the “Dalai Lama clique” and took part in activities that “would harm national security,” according to an official report.
snippet: The officials provided intelligence to the “Dalai Lama clique” and took part in activities that “would harm national security,” according to an official report.

headline.main: Communist Officials in Tibetan Region Punished for Separatism, China Says
headline.print_headline: China: Party Officials in Tibet Punished
